[Intellyhost ](http://www.intellyhost.com/)is the fastest growing web hosting company.We are offering amazing deals on our Virtual Servers. All our Services are packed with a Full Management Contract through which we solve all server administrative issues completely free of cost for our clients.

**Our Servers are in - Germany.**

What does our Management Contract Include? Initial VPS setup with applications of your choice. Server administration, troubleshooting whenever needed. Free Migrations upto 25 Websites. Anything else that doesn't involve website coding & development

We are offering flat 80% discount to our IPv6 and KVM plans.(For first month)
